title: Remove duplicate nested mcp_server/mcp_server directory structure
description: The project has an incorrect nested directory structure with mcp_server/mcp_server/src. This should be flattened to mcp_server/src. This creates confusion and makes imports unnecessarily deep.

title: Migrate remaining PowerShell dependencies to REST API
description: ARCHITECTURE.md says 'Phase out PowerShell completely ✅ (In Progress)' but status is unclear. Audit codebase for any remaining PowerShell dependencies and migrate to REST API for better cross-platform support.

title: Add rate limiting for Azure DevOps API calls
description: No rate limiting implementation found despite ADO API having rate limits. Implement request queuing and backoff strategy to prevent throttling errors and improve reliability under load.

title: Add telemetry and metrics collection
description: ARCHITECTURE.md lists 'Add telemetry' as planned but not implemented. Metrics service exists but needs integration. Implement telemetry for tool usage, error rates, latency, and cache hit rates.

title: Document API versioning strategy
description: Server uses Azure DevOps REST API v7.1 but there's no documented strategy for handling API version changes, deprecations, or maintaining backward compatibility. Add versioning documentation.

title: Add integration test suite for critical workflows
description: Integration tests are marked as requiring ADO credentials and skipped. Set up CI-friendly integration tests using test project or mocked ADO environment. Critical workflows need end-to-end validation.

title: Consolidate duplicate type definitions across files
description: Multiple files define similar types (WorkItemType, ItemContext, etc.). Audit for duplicate type definitions and consolidate into shared types/ directory to ensure consistency.

title: Add pre-commit hooks for code quality
description: No pre-commit hooks configured. Add husky + lint-staged to run TypeScript compilation, ESLint, Prettier, and basic tests before commits. Prevents broken code from entering repository.

title: Reduce console.error usage in production code
description: Found 12 instances of console.error() in production code (paths.ts, logger.ts, markdown-converter.ts). These should use the logger service exclusively for consistent logging and to respect MCP_DEBUG flag.

title: Re-enable and fix skipped Jest tests
description: Jest config has 9+ tests in testPathIgnorePatterns that are skipped due to 'import.meta issues' or 'ADO credentials required'. These should be fixed with proper mocking or environment setup, not permanently ignored.

title: Improve test coverage to meet 80% threshold
description: Project has coverage thresholds set (80% lines, 75% functions, 70% branches) but actual coverage status is unknown. Run coverage report and identify gaps, particularly in integration tests and error paths.

title: Add TypeScript path aliases to reduce relative import complexity
description: Configure TypeScript path aliases in tsconfig.json (@/utils, @/services, @/types, etc.) to eliminate deep relative imports and improve code maintainability. Update all imports across the codebase.

title: Standardize error handling across all handlers
description: While handlers generally return ToolExecutionResult, error handling patterns are inconsistent. Some use formatError(), others build responses manually. Create a standard error handling pattern and apply it uniformly.

title: Add ESLint rule to prevent direct console usage
description: Configure ESLint to flag console.log/error/warn usage and require logger service instead. Add exemptions only for bootstrap code that runs before logger is available.
